name: image transition
desc: The image_transition module receives two images and is used to transition from one image to another in any one of a variety of methods, including image fades and wipes.

properties.name: Transition Method
properties.desc: The Transition Method tells the module how to fade from one image to the next.

properties.name: Transition Percent
properties.desc: The Transition Percent slider adjust how much of the right image will be visible.

properties.name: Reverse Wipe Direction
properties.desc: TheReverse Wipe Direction toggle reverses the direction a wipe is performed. If Wipe from Left->Right is the current method, and this toggle is on, the wipe will be performed from right to left.
